verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
That which survives the sword of Your word
Is given grace in the wilderness.
You have drawn close by Your kindness and love,
So You rebuild the barren place.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
And there'll be watchmen on that day,
And they will call out from the hills,
Arise, let us go up to the Lord our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now we will come from the ends of the earth,
Blind, halt, and lame, and laboring,
And as our tears are turned into praise,
Shouting out loud, we will return!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now we will take up our tambourine,
And we'll go out to dance and sing.
Now we will plant our vines on the hills,
And offer fruit for all to eat!
